template.description: Add metadata handling. Saves to mongo database
template.name: SDD-RP-StagingZone-v3.0

labels.label: Listen for encrypted emails. Send to the secure zone for decypting.
Hold data/template files until an email is received with a matching data file name
Since we can't send email from the secure zone, we send them here in the staging area
Listen for a response from the secure zone that will tell us which data file to send to the secure zone.
After a report is approved the metadata is sent to the yellow zone (here) where it is put into a database where other tools may access it

entry.value: #{Yellow Zone Record Processing SFTP Input Directory}

value.name: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern

entry.key: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

value.name: Enable Literal Parsing of the Pattern

entry.key: Permit Whitespace and Comments in Pattern
